targets.expr:
max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim="data-$4ALLPORTAL_DB"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim="data-$4ALLPORTAL_DB"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim="data-$4ALLPORTAL_DB"})
* 100)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim="data-$4ALLPORTAL_DB"})))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim="data-$4ALLPORTAL_DB"})))
)
